short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send selected text to backend for processing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feedback Hero: multilingual service for automating customer feedback processing in e-commerce.

Feedback Hero generates responses to feedback that you don't have to check with the person and correct before posting.

Highlight feedback text on any e-commerce platform, select "Feedback Hero: Get AI Response" in the context menu. The selected text will be analyzed by the neuron network. The result will be a response indistinguishable from a live person.
